channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in middle of inside lane going North, 12th April
item.description:
Large pothole 1 - 2ft diameter, quite deep, really thumped in the car. Between Junctions 11a and 11 going North on the M5 near Gloucester.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mirror missing on busy blind corner of Whitecross Square and Naunton Road, 12th April
item.description:
There used to be a mirror available at the end of Whitecross Square that showed oncoming cars, it appears it has been broken / missing since 2010. Would avoid an accident waiting to happen if it was repaired/ replaced. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Whitecross Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Parking, 12th April
item.description:
AK59YFE Metallic Grey Volvo V70 Estate has been parked continuously since Saturday 10th April 2021 in the 2 Hours Parking Bays by the Play Area, Salisbury Avenue, Cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Katherine Court Salisbury Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in wood on Weaver's Field, 12th April
item.description:
Lots of building waste (planks of wood and bricks) has been dumped over a wide area of the wood. There are also bricks scattered further into the wood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Farmfield Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Abandoned roadworks signage frame & sandbags, 12th April
item.description:
A-frame for temporary road signage (no sign, just the frame) stood on pavement - A40 Lansdown Road, close to traffic light junction with Hatherley Road. One sandbag with frame, and another 20m away on the verge. A-frame and sandbags used to be lying flat on roadside verge for many months - recently the frame has been stood up on the pavement / cycle path. All needs to be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged railings on the bridge., 11th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Colesbourne Road, Cheltenham
